summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2707 for the improvement of North and West Forty-ninth Street, from Phinney Avenue to Eleventh Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers of vitrified or cement pipe therein of the proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district , under Ordinance No. 31831, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
